short_summary: The Department of Defense has a requirement for safety belts.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Rue Notre, Dame St E., Montreal, QC, Canada, H1N 2E9, no later than 31 March 2024.
full_summary:
== Government Tender Announcement ==
### Request for Proposal: Belt Aircraft Safety for Replenishment

**Reference Number:** cb-7919-14233294
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-247740
**Publication Date:** August 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** August 18, 2023, 14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** September 1, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** April 26, 2024

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
**UNSPSC:** 46180000 - Personal Safety and Protection
**Trade Agreements:** None

**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
**Delivery Location:** 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Rue Notre Dame St E., Montreal, QC, Canada H1N 2E9

**Item 1:**
- **GSIN:** N1600
- **NSN:** 1680-00-725-5927
- **Item Description:** Airport Safety Belt
- **Quantity:** 100 units
- **Unit of Issue:** Each

**Proposal Requirements:**
- Bidders must submit a proposal outlining their response to the requirements outlined in the tender notice.
- Equivalent or substitute products must be clearly indicated, along with a Certificate of Conformance from the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM).
- Proposals must be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**
- **Name:** Menna El Kholy
- **Email:** [menna.elkholy@forces.gc.ca](mailto:menna.elkholy@forces.gc.ca)
- **Phone:** (819) 939-6101

**Attachments:**
- Tender notice document: [English version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7919/w8485-247740---100-x-safety-belts-rfp-en.pdf)
- Tender notice document: [French version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7919/w8485-247740---100-x-safety-belts-rfp-fr_0.pdf) 


I have condensed the content to 300 words. The additions include completing the formatting, and correcting a few minor anomalies
